channel.title: Anyone Using SquareSpace + Stripe?
channel.description:
I've just setup a test web site on SquareSpace and I'm really impressed with the whole infrastructure. Easier than Wordpress or coding PHP -- leaving me with more time for working on my app.
I've also connected their **[Stripe Commerce][1]** option and that was also quite easy. In the past, I have use FastSpring and Paypal for payment & they work well too but I find the SquareSpace/Stripe integration quite elegant, seamless & quick to setup.
In the end, I will probably offer all 3 types of payments if only to cover the regions of the world not covered by Stripe.
Anyone else selling software with SquareSpace/Stripe? What's your experience?
[1]: http://blog.squarespace.com/blog/squarespace-commerce-is-here
